content: supplies rules of use this pattern should not be sold nor distributed a hook number 3 10 g of light green cotton if you use it and publish your work indicate its 10 g of dark green cotton source 5 g of cotton of color of no importance http //bouquetalong blogspot com 36 g of cotton divided into three matched or colors http //comtessecreations blogspot com stuffing you can make as many bouquets as you want but you should not sell them first part the horn light green recommendation the horn will be stuffed it must be quite firm so that a little girl can hold it take care well to crochet it quite tight r1 6 single_crochet in a circle end with slip_stitch 6 r2 1 chain 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet end with slip_stitch 12 r3 1 chain 1 single_crochet in each back loop end with 1 slip_stitch 12 r4-7 1 chain 12 single_crochet 1 slip_stitch r8 3 increase in the following way 1 chain 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the single_crochet following 3 times end with 1 slip_stitch 15 r9-12 single_crochet 15 r13 3 increase 1 chain 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the single_crochet following 3 times end with 1 slip_stitch 18 r14-17 single_crochet 18 r18 3 increase 1 chain 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the single_crochet following 3 times end with 1 slip_stitch 21 r19 single_crochet 21 r20 1 chain 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the single_crochet following 7 times end with 1 slip_stitch 28 r21 1 chain 1 single_crochet 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the single_crochet following 9 times end with 1 slip_stitch 37 r22-23 single_crochet 37 r24 1 chain 1 single_crochet 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the single_crochet following 12 times 1 slip_stitch 49 r25-26 single_crochet 49 r27 1 chain 1 single_crochet 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the single_crochet following 16 times 1 slip_stitch 65 second part leaves change color to the dark green to continue on the horn r28 single_crochet 65 end with slip_stitch r29 1 chain 2 single_crochet 1 slip_stitch 1 chain of 6 chain 1 slip_stitch in same the slip_stitch 4 single_crochet 13 times 2 single_crochet 1 slip_stitch r30 *7 double_crochet 1 chain 7 double_crochet* in the loop formed by the chain jump two spaces 1 single_crochet 12 times end with slip_stitch leave 30 cm or 8 of yarn third part the top color of no importance r1 6 single_crochet in a circle end with slip_stitch 6 r2 1 chain 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet end with slip_stitch 12 r3 1 chain 1 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the single_crochet following 6 times end with slip_stitch 18 r4 1 chain 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the single_crochet following 6 times end with slip_stitch 24 r5 1 chain 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the single_crochet following 6 times end with slip_stitch 30 r6 1 chain 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the single_crochet following 6 times to end with 1 slip_stitch 36 r7 1 chain 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the single_crochet following 6
